input.sentences: the fireworks in the spy resembled flashing sparks going off .
this is a view of the bridge before the fireworks started going off .
the city sky line is so beautiful at night .
fireworks bursting in the sky as the onlookers enjoy the show .
after the fireworks were over the moon came out to shine through the fog .
output.sentences: A couple kissed under either the sound of gunshots or the sparks of firework sparks.
They couldn't tell which as their eyes were closed and their lips were focused on each other.
They continued to ignore the breathtaking skyline, losing their breath all on their own.
Onlookers paid them no mind, lost in the firework display, not theirs.
A fog shielded the moon from view, and the couple continued to be lost in each other.
